title: [CLIENT] No more personal message thingy?
body: When I open my friend list and click on the ''Online'' button I can't write a personal message like I used to. Did this feature got removed?

replies.body: You can change your status message by clicking the space just to the left of the status indicator. Click within the spot I boxed in orange as seen in the attached image.

> [{quoted}](name=nejuer,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=zE6AGv0z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-13T12:10:03.337+0000)
>
> You can change your status message by clicking the space just to the left of the status indicator. Click within the spot I boxed in orange as seen in the attached image.

Thanks for this :)
Snap. I can confirm that this trick works. I didn't even realized it was bugged in the first place. Leaving same status for awhile op.

This is a known issue, and we're working to resolve it.

As freeformline mentioned, you can still use the friend list options menu to change it. :]

btw, Katey. You know how to can make a separate list from the "General" list for others?? Well, my other list is below the "General" list instead of at the top like it use to be. Is that a bug or what?? I notice in recent patches, it switches back and forth sometimes. I want it to stay at the top.
You can still do it, you just need to do it in the friends list menu. Press on the little gear and you'll see a box in which to enter your status.
